department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: Chemical reaction engineering is one of the fundamental courses for chemical engineers. The goal of this course is to develop an understanding of reaction engineering, including chemical kinetics (chemical reaction rates and reaction mechanism) and reactor design.
goal.ch: Chemical reaction engineering is one of the fundamental courses for chemical engineers. The goal of this course is to develop an understanding of reaction engineering, including chemical kinetics (chemical reaction rates and reaction mechanism) and reactor design.

content.en:
Introduction
Mole balances
Conversion and reactor sizing
Rate laws
Stoichiometry
Isothermal reactor design: Conversion
Isothermal reactor design: Molar flow rates
Collection and analysis of rate data
Multiple reactions
Catalysis and catalytic reactors

textbook.en: Textbook Essentials of Chemical Reaction Engineering, H. Scott Fogler, 高立書局
textbook.ch: Textbook Essentials of Chemical Reaction Engineering, H. Scott Fogler, 高立書局

grading.ch: 小考 20％ 期中考 40％ 期末考 40％
